title: Mage Hand
content: r. Outside of this specific scenario, the Mage Hand's invisibility behaves like any other form of standard invisibility. For Arcane Tricksters, Mage Hand can attempt to pick locks or disarm traps However, it will do so using its own stats and proficiencies, not the Arcane Trickster's,, making this a pretty poor usage of supplies.
